task.title: How to Sum Up Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the sum up feature of the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully sum up numbers, you must know what summing up is.

result.p: The result from the sum up function is displayed.

example.p: You want to sum up 2 and 3. The equation will look like: 2+3=5. You enter 3. Press plus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 5 appears on the screen.
